title: Turrets die too quickly
body:
i noticed that outer turret got less than 100 armor and MR 
while inner turrets got about 40 Armor MR

turrets die way too quickly

Inner turrets can't even hold 1 minion wave. Thats quite ridiculous. Ain't much of a difference between killing a turret and killing a Super Minions

replies.body: Heck I think the Super Minions are harder to kill at this point...
Winions.  My opinion is that once an inhibitor is down someone needs to defend and keep the Super Minions down or you lose fast.
I can confirm.killing a super minion is much harder than killing a turret.
do you want games to be 50-120 minutes long
Actually the best games ive had have been that long before Riot started the snowball/stompfest/lopsided age
they are fun as hell to play and it feels so satisfying to finally win
But reasonably requesting any more than an hour for one game is a mentally challenged stance to take for obvious reasons. You can dislike me all you want, but you know I'm right.

In Dota the turrets protect you
In LoL you protect the turrets
And yet Riot keeps nerfing them.....starting to think Riot is controlled by trolls who dont actually play the game
Actually, they play it too much. So much that they want game times reduced to about two minutes for them, so they can get on with their heaps of work.

>Inner turrets can't even hold 1 minion wave

Wait what?  Yes they can don't just make shit up for the sake of your argument.

They reduced their actual armor/mr stats and gave them %reduced damage. They also added fortification into the game, giving them even more reduction early in the game. In my opinion, turrets feel fine the way they are. 

Except they got rid of fortification on the bot turret alone, which I am severely not okay with.
